PropertyCard.loginOrRegisterText: Login or register to view campaign details and invest.

sidebar.copyright: Copyright © 2023. WealthPixels LLC. All Rights Reserved.

explorePage.searchPlaceHolder: Enter property name, type, or location…

limitCard.title: Invest without limits
limitCard.description: Complete our professional investor application and invest without limits.

manageProfileCard.title: Manage your Investor Profile
manageProfileCard.description: Your investor profile helps us personalize your experience and remain compliant. You can update this information at any time.
manageProfileCard.investorTips: Enter your full legal name as mentioned in your valid identity proof document.

residence.title: RESIDENCE TYPE
residence.tips: Select your residence type based on the available options.

address.title: ADDRESS LINE 1
address.tips: Enter the building number, building name and street/area name for the selected residence type.

country.title: COUNTRY
country.tips: Select the country in which your residence is located.

city.title: CITY
city.tips: Select the city in which your residence is located.

addressProofType.title: ADDRESS PROOF TYPE
addressProofType.tips: Select the document that you will be uploading as the address proof based on the available options.

addressProofUpload.title: UPLOAD ADDRESS PROOF
addressProofUpload.tips: Upload your address proof document in pdf, png or jpeg format. Maximum 10 MB.

employmentType.title: EMPLOYMENT TYPE
employmentType.tips: Select your employment type based on the available options.

companyName.title: COMPANY NAME
companyName.tips: Enter the name of the company that employs you.

insightsPage.title: My Earnings
insightsPage.description: Net. earnings across all investments. YTD.
